title: ‘Even More Room To Grow’: Vingegaard’s Trainer Backs Tour de France Champion To Hit Harder in High Mountains
content:
Vingegaard denied Pogačar for sensational stage victory Wednesday to change the tone of Le Tour, and he might only just be getting started.

Read the full article at ‘Even More Room To Grow’: Vingegaard’s Trainer Backs Tour de France Champion To Hit Harder in High Mountains on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
